text: Harold Joseph Steele was Archdeacon of Waitemata from 1965 until 1972. Steele was educated at St John's College, Auckland and ordained in 1936. After a curacy at Remuera he held incumbencies in Auckland, Waimate, Papatoetoe and Mount Eden.Crockfords (London, Church House, 1995) p 934 ==References== Category:People educated at St John's College, Auckland Category:Archdeacons of Waitemata
title: Harold Steele
